# Mundane Robe
## Overview
**Aura** moderate illusion; **CL** 10th

**Slot** body

**Price** 4,250 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

*This long robe is well-tailored and stylish, but is otherwise unremarkable.*

The *mundane robe* automatically masks all magical auras when worn, including all the auras of all magical items in the wearer's possession and spells presently affecting them and the wearer of the robe, including its own. In addition, while wearing the robe, you may cast *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]* three times per day. Finally, the robe confers a +5 competence bonus on all [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]**,* *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]***,** 

**Cost** 2,310 gp

**Source:** Freeport Companion (Green Ronin), pg. 70

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* To detect this robe, it must be interacted with; ie., it must be touched in some way. It requires an *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]* spell or actions to identify which include physical examination while some sort of *[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]* effect in use.

*House Rule:* The robe masks all magical auras when worn, including all the auras of all magical items in the wearer's immediate possesion and spells presently affecting them.

Note that the description and aura has been changed from the original source (Green Ronin, Freeport Companion p.70) for clarification based upon the stated effect as written and the spells used.  Also the price, effect, CL and requirements have been adjusted to follow PF crafting guidelines.
